dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2414 IH: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a military and civilian partnership for trauma readiness grant program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Castor of Florida (for herself and Mr. Hudson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a military and civilian partnership for trauma readiness grant program.

section.header: Reauthorization of military and civilian partnership for trauma readiness grant program
section.text: Section 1291(g) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300dâ€“91(g)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting fiscal years 2025 through 2029.
